about_the_game:
Step up your soldier’s arsenal with deeply discounted infantry and Harasser weapons! This bundle contains comparable weapons across all three Empires making this a great deal no matter what your style of play!

The PlanetSide 2 Elite Soldier Bundle contains:
  • One 7-Day Experience Boost – Make the most of your kills!
  • M40 Fury-H (Vanu Sovereignty)
  • M40 Fury-H (Terran Republic)
  • M40 Fury-H (New Conglomerate)
  • NS-7 PDW
  • Cerberus Pistol (Vanu Sovereignty) – A high damage pistol
  • TS2 Inquisitor (Terran Republic) – A high capacity pistol
  • LA3 Desperado (New Conglomerate) – A deadly burstfire pistol
  • Phobos VX86 pump action Shotgun (Vanu Sovereignty)
  • TRS-12 Uppercut pump action Shotgun (Terran Republic)
  • Gd-66 Claw pump-action Shotgun (New Conglomerate)
  • Digital Camo (Vanu Sovereignty)
  • Digital Camo (Terran Republic)
  • Digital Camo (New Conglomerate)

The PlanetSide 2 Elite Soldier Bundle contains:

name: Planetside 2: Elite Soldier Bundle

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows XP
  • Processor: Intel Core 2 Duo E6850 or higher / AMD Phenom II X2 or higher
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 8600 series or higher / AMD or ATI 4850 series or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX Compatible Sound Card
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS *: Windows 7
  • Memory: 8 GB RAM
  • Graphics: nVidia GeForce 540 or higher / AMD HD 6870 or higher
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Network: Broadband Internet connection
  • Storage: 15 GB available space
  • Sound Card: DirectX compatible Sound Card

short_description: Step up your soldier’s arsenal with deeply discounted infantry and Harasser weapons! This bundle contains comparable weapons across all three Empires making this a great deal no matter what your style of play!
supported_languages: English, German, French, Italian, Spanish - Spain, Turkish
